SA01vabhdiku:1: taṃ satpathajñaṃ praṇipatya buddhaṃ śāstraṃ kariṣyāmyabhidharmadīpam //
SA01vabhdiku:4: Abhidh-d_3 na karma svakatotsargāt jñavyaktātmakatā malāḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:26: Abhidh-d_14 kliṣṭameva hi vijñānaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ janmani śrayāt /
SA01vabhdiku:28: Abhidh-d_15 nabhaḥ khalu nabho dhātorāsanno hetureṣa tu /
SA01vabhdiku:32: Abhidh-d_17 sanidarśana ādyārthaḥ mūrtāḥ sapratighā daśa /
SA01vabhdiku:34: Abhidh-d_18 śeṣāstridhā iha sarve 'pi rūpadhātau caturdaśa /
SA01vabhdiku:50: Abhidh-d_26 tridheha dvayamāryasya rāgiṇaḥ saśubhasya ca /
SA01vabhdiku:51: na śubhaṃ nāpi ca kliṣṭaṃ dvitīyādiṣu darśakam //
SA01vabhdiku:68: Abhidh-d_35 cittākhyāḥ sapta sālambā dharmākhyaḥ saṃprayuktakaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:70: Abhidh-d_36 spṛśyaṃ dvidhā sadharmāṃśāḥ saha tā nava bhautikāḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:71: daśa sāvayavā mūrtāḥ ta eva daśa saṃcitāḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:80: Abhidh-d_41 sabhāga eva dharmākhyaḥ śeṣāstūbhayathā smṛtāḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:86: Abhidh-d_44 cakṣuḥ paśyati vijñānaṃ vijānāti svagocaram /
SA01vabhdiku:88: Abhidh-d_45 ekasya cakṣuṣaḥ kāryaṃ vijñānamathavā dvayoḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:94: Abhidh-d_48 na hyūrdhvaṃ cakṣuṣaḥ kāyo na rūpaṃ nākṣijaṃ manaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:95: vijñānasya tu netrārthastau ca kāyasya savaṃtaḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:96: Abhidh-d_49 nopariṣṭācchru teḥ kāyo na śabdo na svakaṃ manaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:97: vijñānasya tu nihrādastau ca kāyasya sarvataḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:102: Abhidh-d_52 adhvādyāḥ skandhaparyāyāḥ dharmādyā vastunaḥ sataḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:112: Abhidh-d_57 ghrāṇaṃ jihvā ca kāyaśca tulyārthagrāhyadastrayam /
SA01vabhdiku:120: Abhidh-d_61 cakṣurdhātuṃ hi rūpāptaṃ parijānan pṛthagjanaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:125: tadā saṃyojanaṃ tvāryaḥ paryādatte na kiñcana //
SA01vabhdiku:128: Abhidh-d_65 na tu saṃyojanaṃ kiñcitparyādatte tadā hyasau /
SA01vabhdiku:137: ābhāsvarācca vairāgyaṃ yāti hanti tu nāsravān //
SA01vabhdiku:138: Abhidh-d_70 parijānansukhaṃ yogī prajahāti tadeha ca /
SA01vabhdiku:139: śubhakṛtsnācca vairāgyaṃ yāti kleśānna hanti tu //
SA01vabhdiku:140: Abhidh-d_71 dvivijñeyāḥ guṇāḥ pañca hetuḥ sarve kṣarākṣarāḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:144: Abhidh-d_73 nāmnā dvāviṃśatistāni dravyato daśa sapta ca /
SA01vabhdiku:156: Abhidh-d_79 sattvākhyā sattvavaicitryaṃ dhṛtiḥ kleśodbhavaśca yaiḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:162: Abhidh-d_82 śraddhādīnāṃ vidāṃ caiva doṣaḥ śuddhau malodaye /
SA01vabhdiku:166: Abhidh-d_84 nāpramādo 'pyasau vīryāt, na hrīḥ prāgalbhanigrahāt /
SA01vabhdiku:170: Abhidh-d_86 kāyasya bādhanaṃ duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ tu cetasaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:171: sukhaṃ ca sumanastā ca sātaṃ śārīramānasam //
SA01vabhdiku:172: Abhidh-d_87 kāyasya bādhanaṃ duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ tu cetasaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:173: sukhaṃ ca sumanastā ca sātaṃ śārīramānasam //
SA01vabhdiku:178: navābhyāsapraheyāṇi dvidhā pañca na tu trayam //
SA01vabhdiku:179: Abhidh-d_90 pūrvaṃ kramodbhavaiḥ kāme vipāko labhyate dvayam /
SA01vabhdiku:180: anyaiḥ ṣaṭ sapta vāṣṭau vā ṣaḍ rūpe antye tu jīvitam //
SA01vabhdiku:181: Abhidh-d_91 mriyamāṇairnirodhyante trīṇyante aṣṭau tu madhyame /
SA01vabhdiku:182: daśāṣṭau nava catvāri kāme pañca śubhāni vā //
SA01vabhdiku:194: Abhidh-d_97 kāminaḥ khalu duḥkhena tadrāgī durmanastayā /
SA01vabhdiku:206: Abhidh-d_103 samyaktvaniyatā ye tu ye ca śraddhādhimuktikāḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:222: Abhidh-d_111 evaṃ rūpe 'pi vijñeyo hitvā gandharasadvayam /
SA01vabhdiku:223: cittaṃ caitasikaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ tu svalakṣaṇaiḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:229: kliṣṭe ṣaṭ aśubhe tu dve āhrīkyamanapatrapā //
SA01vabhdiku:248: Abhidh-d_124 sarvatra saṃbhavānmiddhaṃ yatra syāttatra nirdiśet /
SA01vabhdiku:250: Abhidh-d_125 sāśubhaṃ middhakaukṛtyaṃ rūpadhātau na vidyate /
SA01vabhdiku:252: Abhidh-d_126 saṃprayuktaḥ saṃskāraḥ samatā yasya pañcadhā /
SA01vabhdiku:264: ādilābhe saha prākca tadūrdhvaṃ vā tridheṣyate //
SA01vabhdiku:265: Abhidh-d_132 kliṣṭāṇāṃ kuśalānāṃ ca tadanyeṣāṃ tridhā matā /
SA01vabhdiku:289: Abhidh-d_144 svarūpaṃ vedayaṃścchabdo vyañjanādīni ca dhruvam /
SA01vabhdiku:293: Abhidh-d_146 sphoṭākhyo nāparo ghoṣācchabdo nityaḥ prasiddhyati /
SA01vabhdiku:295: Abhidh-d_147 na śrutyā śrūyate śabdastadanyā ca gatiḥ śruteḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:300: tathaiva ca vipākaśca sābhāgyaṃ prāptayo dvidhā //
SA01vabhdiku:311: Abhidh-d_155 kāyikaṃ vāṅmayaṃ caiva cetanākhyaṃ ca mānasam /
SA01vabhdiku:320: Abhidh-d_159 annamatyagninirdagdhaṃ yathā sthālī ca saṃskṛtā /
SA01vabhdiku:329: etānyo yāti śaraṇaṃ sa yāti śaraṇatrayam //
SA01vabhdiku:343: bhūsaṃcāreṇa hānyā ca tyajyate dhyānajaṃ śubham //
SA01vabhdiku:356: Abhidh-d_177 adho 'pi madhyamaṃ karma dhyānenāntyepi nirvṛteḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:365: satkṣetre kriyate yacca phalaṃ tasya niyamyate //
SA01vabhdiku:372: Abhidh-d_185 sapākamaśubhaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ sapākaṃ rūpajaṃ sitam /
SA01vabhdiku:376: Abhidh-d_187 navame cetanā yā tu sā kṛṣṇākṛṣṇayāghātinī /
SA01vabhdiku:378: Abhidh-d_188 kāyādyakuśalaṃ karma sarvaṃ duścaritaṃ matam /
SA01vabhdiku:383: śubhāḥ sapta dvidhā jñeyā ekadhaite samāhitāḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:384: Abhidh-d_191 yā sāmanteṣvavijñaptiḥ pṛṣṭheṣu tu viparyayaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:391: prāṇinaścātha bhogāśca nāmarūpaṃ ca nāma ca //
SA01vabhdiku:398: Abhidh-d_198 paiśunyaṃ bhedakṛdvākyaṃ pāruṣyaṃ tu yadapriyam /
SA01vabhdiku:402: Abhidh-d_200 cetanā na kriyāmārgastaistu sattā pravartate /
SA01vabhdiku:417: phalaṃ śubhasya catvāri dve trīṇi ca śubhādayaḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:418: Abhidh-d_208 śubhādyāstvaśubhasya dve trīṇi catvāri ca kramāt /
SA01vabhdiku:419: avyākṛtasya te tu dve trīṇi trīṇi śubhādayaḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:420: Abhidh-d_209 sarve catvāryatītasya madhyamasya ca bhāvinaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:422: Abhidh-d_210 catvāryekabhuvo dve vā trīṇi cāparabhūmikāḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:424: Abhidh-d_211 ekaṃ trīṇi dvayaṃ caiva śaikṣādyāḥ paścimasya tu /
SA01vabhdiku:425: dve dve pañca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ dṛggheyasya tu karmaṇaḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:426: Abhidh-d_212 trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛṣṭiheyādayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:427: te tvabhyāsapraheyasya dve catvāri tridhā matāḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:430: Abhidh-d_214 kuśalaṃ vāthavā pāpaṃ yadatītaṃ dadatphalam /
SA01vabhdiku:433: kartṛtā bhoktṛtā coktā niṣiddhā śāśvatasya tu //
SA01vabhdiku:434: Abhidh-d_216 syātkarmasvakatā nāsti tasya ceti catuṣkikā /
SA01vabhdiku:436: Abhidh-d_217 dvitīyā tatphalasthasya karmaṇā tena cānvayāt /
SA01vabhdiku:444: Abhidh-d_221 dvitīyā tu vihīnena dhruvapākena karmaṇā /
SA01vabhdiku:457: dviṣatāmapi yaṃ dṛṣṭvā manaḥ sadyaḥ prasīdati //
SA01vabhdiku:461: buddhotpāde naraḥ strī vā tadādyaṃ cittamaśnute //
SA01vabhdiku:462: Abhidh-d_230 sarvebhyaḥ sarvadā sarvaṃ vadato dānapūraṇam /
SA01vabhdiku:500: Abhidh-d_249 dharmadātre 'pi bālāya pitre mātre 'tha rogiṇe /
SA01vabhdiku:510: Abhidh-d_254 śīlaṃ śubhamayaṃ rūpaṃ vyākhyātaṃ tatprabhedataḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:514: Abhidh-d_256 puṇyaṃ samāhitaṃ tvatra bhāvanā cittabhāvanāt /
SA01vabhdiku:520: Abhidh-d_259 akāryapravaṇo loko duḥkhabhāgī ca yadvaśāt /
SA01vabhdiku:526: Abhidh-d_262 rāgadvedhāt matāḥ sapta dṛṣṭibhedāddaśa smṛtāḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:528: Abhidh-d_263 kāmarāgo bhavākhyaśca dvidhāḥ rāgaḥ prabhidyate /
SA01vabhdiku:538: Abhidh-d_268 bhavāgre kṣāntiheyā ye dṛggheyā eva te matāḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:540: Abhidh-d_269 ahaṃ mameti yā dṛṣṭirasau satkāyadṛk smṛtā /
SA01vabhdiku:558: Abhidh-d_278 kāṅkṣā pañca dṛśo 'vidyā tadvyāmiśrātha kevalāḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:560: Abhidh-d_279 dravyato daśa caikaśca nāmnā sapta tu te matāḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:580: Abhidh-d_289 ādyaṃ dṛṣṭidvayaṃ kāme nivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ matam /
SA01vabhdiku:585: avidyā dhīśca tṛṣṇā ca na kāṅkṣāmānadṛṣṭayaḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:590: Abhidh-d_294 ekāṃśākhyaṃ vibhajyākhyaṃ pṛcchākhyaṃ sthāpyameva ca /
SA01vabhdiku:600: Abhidh-d_299 sarvamasti pradeśo 'sti sarvaṃ nāstīti cāparaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:602: Abhidh-d_300 ebhyo yaḥ prathamo vādī bhajate sādhutāmasau /
SA01vabhdiku:610: Abhidh-d_304 buddhyā yasyekṣyate cihnaṃ tatsaṃjñeyaṃ caturvidham /
SA01vabhdiku:616: Abhidh-d_307 rūpādau vastuni kṣīṇe satyevotpadyate matiḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:622: Abhidh-d_310 dvitīyaṃ janma jātasya vastuno nopapadyate /
SA01vabhdiku:629: vada somya kathaṃ yāti pratītyā vastu vastutām //
SA01vabhdiku:634: Abhidh-d_316 prakurvanti daśāmātraṃ hetavo vastunaḥ sataḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:642: Abhidh-d_320 ko vighnaḥ aṅgavaikalyam na tatsarvāstitā sadā /
SA01vabhdiku:643: tatkathaṃ śrūyatāṃ sadbhyaḥ durbodhā khalu dharmatā //
SA01vabhdiku:646: Abhidh-d_322 na vartamānatā rūpamatītājātatā na ca /
SA01vabhdiku:649: tathā śaktistathā velā tathā sattā tathā kriyā //
SA01vabhdiku:654: Abhidh-d_326 dharmāḥ ṣoḍaśa vijñeyāḥ pratyekaṃ tribhavātmakāḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:668: Abhidh-d_333 catvāraḥ parivṛtte sve rūpāptāḥ khalvapi trayaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:670: Abhidh-d_334 tadvadeva dvitīye 'pi pañcame 'pi tathaiva ca /
SA01vabhdiku:675: rūpāpte prathame 'dhastāt trayaḥ sve khalvapi trayaḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:684: Abhidh-d_341 sve trayaḥ kāmadhātvāptā rūpāptāśca trayastrayaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:686: Abhidh-d_342 tṛtīye khalvapi sve ca sāsravārthāvalambinaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:696: Abhidh-d_347 duḥkhendriye tu kāmāptaḥ svaireva saha sarvagaiḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:702: Abhidh-d_350 sukhendriye tadālambe citte tadgocare 'pi ca /
SA01vabhdiku:709: bhavatyanantaraṃ ṣaḍ vā tasyorddhvaṃ pañca pañca vā //
SA01vabhdiku:711: ekaṃ vā pañca vā ṣaḍ vā sapta vā yadi vā daśa //
SA01vabhdiku:718: Abhidh-d_358 rāgaḥ svadṛśi mānaśva dveṣo 'nyatra pratāyate /
SA01vabhdiku:722: Abhidh-d_360 vyavidyāḥ sakalāḥ kleśāḥ kāme kāmāsravo mataḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:726: Abhidh-d_362 sāvidyā dve upādāne yathāktau dve tu dṛṅmaye /
SA01vabhdiku:732: Abhidh-d_365 śeṣāṇyanuśayāḥ pañca pañcadhā pañcadhā punaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:734: Abhidh-d_366 ādyantye dve dṛśau kāṅkṣākāmacchando dvireva yaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:756: Abhidh-d_377 saumanasyena rāgasya saṃprayogaḥ sukhena ca /
SA01vabhdiku:760: Abhidh-d_379 upekṣayā tu sarveṣām kāmāptānāmayaṃ vidhiḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:762: Abhidh-d_380 īrṣyayā daurmanasyena kaukṛtyasya tathā krudhaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:765: dvābhyāṃ māyā tathā śāṭhyaṃ mrakṣo middhaṃ tathaiva ca //
SA01vabhdiku:781: Abhidh-d_389 anadhiṣṭhātṛkatvaṃ ca pāratantryaṃ ca paśyataḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:804: Abhidh-d_400 ākārāḥ khalu sarvepi bhāvyante gotralābhataḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:833: saṃmukhe nāma jātāstu tisra eva vinirdiśet //
SA01vabhdiku:836: Abhidh-d_416 āryasya khalu vairāgyaprayoge kṣepaṇe pi ca /
SA01vabhdiku:859: Abhidh-d_427 punastridhā tridhā kṛtvā trīnato rūpagā nava /
SA01vabhdiku:924: Abhidh-d_459 śīlāṅgebhyaśca tābhyāṃ ca draṣṭavyā triṣvarūpiṣu /
SA01vabhdiku:935: buddho yastadguṇe śraddhā prasādaḥ sa jine mataḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:938: Abhidh-d_466 śīlānāṃ yattu vaimalyaṃ tatprasādastathaiva tu /
SA01vabhdiku:942: Abhidh-d_468 pūrvoktaiva hi yā bodhiḥ sā samyagjñānamucyate /
SA01vabhdiku:944: Abhidh-d_469 dharmavyāpārato loke dharmyapi vyāpṛto mataḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:946: Abhidh-d_470 vimuktiḥ śāśvatī yaiva sā virāgādayastrayaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:947: ākhyātā dhātavaḥ sūtre tridhā bhedo hyapekṣayā //
SA01vabhdiku:957: caturthī pañcamī ṣaṣṭhī vidyāt saptasu bhūmiṣu //
SA01vabhdiku:980: Abhidh-d_486 dṛṅmārge prathame jñāne tribhirjñānaiḥ samanvitaḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:990: Abhidh-d_491 mārgākhye tvanvayajñāne ṣaḍ bhāvyante 'tha sapta vā /
SA01vabhdiku:1011: aṣṭākāraṃ dvitīyaṃ tu navajñānamayaṃ tu yat //
SA01vabhdiku:1016: Abhidh-d_504 navamaṃ khalu rūpārthaṃ saṃskṛtālambyate param /
SA01vabhdiku:1018: Abhidh-d_505 sandhau sandhau ca buddhasya kāyenārāyaṇaṃ balam /
SA01vabhdiku:1038: Abhidh-d_515 arthākhyā khalu sarvatra ṣaḍjñānānyathavā nava /
SA01vabhdiku:1040: Abhidh-d_516 kāme dhyāneṣu dharmākhyā tadanyā tvādyakāmayoḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:1042: Abhidh-d_517 ṛddhau śrotre 'nyacitte prāgbhāve cyutyudaye kṣaye /
SA01vabhdiku:1044: Abhidh-d_518 catasraḥ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ pañca jñānāni cittadhīḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:1046: Abhidh-d_519 ṣaṣṭhī sarvatra pañcānyā maulīṣu dhyānabhūmiṣu /
SA01vabhdiku:1050: Abhidh-d_521 divyamavyākṛtaṃ śrotraṃ netraṃ cānyā śubhā matāḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:1055: harato dve kuśāstṛbhyo mārebhyo harate param //
SA01vabhdiku:1061: rūpasparśau matau rūpe sveśarīre 'tha vā bahiḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:1064: Abhidh-d_528 tallābho dhyānavat jñeyaḥ śuddhakācca svataśca tat /
SA01vabhdiku:1067: ekasya bruvataḥ sarve nirmitā bruvate samam //
SA01vabhdiku:1068: Abhidh-d_530 adhiṣṭhāya tu nirmāṇaṃ bhāṣante 'nyena cetasā /
SA01vabhdiku:1082: Abhidh-d_537 bhedena tu samāpattidravyāṇi daśa sapta ca /
SA01vabhdiku:1087: tathaiva traya ārūpyā bhavāgraṃ tu dvidhā matam //
SA01vabhdiku:1088: Abhidh-d_540 sāmantāni dvidhā sapta prathamaṃ tu tridhā matam /
SA01vabhdiku:1096: Abhidh-d_544 tṛtīye pañcame prajñā smṛtyupekṣā sukhaṃ sthitiḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:1098: Abhidh-d_545 antye catvāryupekṣe dve samādhiḥ smṛtireva ca /
SA01vabhdiku:1099: kliṣṭe dhyāne caturthe tu dve aṅge vedanā sthitiḥ //
SA01vabhdiku:1100: Abhidh-d_546 dravyātmanā daśaikaṃ ca nāmnā tvaṣṭau daśaiva ca /
SA01vabhdiku:1106: Abhidh-d_549 ādye prītisukhopekṣā dvitīye tu sukhādṛte /
SA01vabhdiku:1120: Abhidh-d_556 dhyātā proktastathā dhyeyaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyānaphalaṃ tathā /
SA01vabhdiku:1124: Abhidh-d_558 karma tvatra dvidhā jñeyaṃ puṇyāpuṇyakriyākriye /
SA01vabhdiku:1126: Abhidh-d_559 jñānaṃ tu naiṣṭhikaṃ jñeyaṃ yathāpūvaṃmudāhṛtam /
SA01vabhdiku:1139: dve trīṇi trīṇi ca dve vā hānapakṣyādyanantaram //
SA01vabhdiku:1143: śuddhakācca tṛtīyaṃ svaṃ niṣṭhā śuddhācca nirmalam //
SA01vabhdiku:1160: Abhidh-d_576 bhāvanā dvividhasyāpi nobhayasya tu bhāvanām /
SA01vabhdiku:1164: Abhidh-d_578 sāsvādaḥ svabhavālambaḥ śubhaṃ dhyānaṃ samantadṛk /
SA01vabhdiku:1182: Abhidh-d_587 yo 'ntyo vajropame dhyāne sarvakleśakṣayāya sā /
SA01vabhdiku:1188: Abhidh-d_590 sukhādhāne sukhā maitrī duḥkhanāśonmukhī kṛpā /
SA01vabhdiku:1190: Abhidh-d_591 draṣṭavyā vṛttireteṣāṃ ākāraiḥ sukhitādi bhiḥ /
SA01vabhdiku:1194: Abhidh-d_593 vimokṣāḥ kathitā aṣṭau teṣāṃ dvāvaśubhātmakau /
